name: Beauty Elixir
preparation:
At Beauty & Essex, a 10,000-square-foot playground of opulence in Hollywood, this cocktail stands out for its simple, refreshing elegance. The cocktail features The Botanist gin, Campo Viejo cava brut, strawberry purée, cucumber water, lemon juice and simple syrup, with a lime chip garnish. Perfect for celebrating the sunshine-infused SoCal holiday season.

Add all the ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake well.

Strain into a coupe glass.

Garnish with a lime chip.
